about_the_game:
When I originally released this game I would have people frequently ask me where they could donate to me.

I used to view accepting any donation as a moral failing unless I was on the absolute brink of death. Even if I did accept donations, I believed that no one would actually donate. My friends pleaded with me to stop being so stubborn and let people help me.

The only thing you get with this DLC is a wallpaper.

This pack is mainly for those who want to throw extra money at me to support me continuing to make games.

You don’t need any DLC to play the game. He Fucked The Girl Out of Me will always be free.

This is only a wallpaper and only exists so people have a way to support me.
